TransactionStateContext.ClaimingState: When an agent pays to claim the throne using the claimThrone function or fallback function.
TransactionStateContext.CommissionState: When the wizard collects commissions using the sweepCommission function.
TransactionStateContext.OwnershipState: When the wizard transfers ownership using the transferOwnership function.

MonetaryTransfers: Funds are transferred to the current monarch or the wizard when the throne is claimed or commission is collected.
Refunds to usurper if excess value is sent in claimThrone function.
